title: Remove heart CTA and restyle envelope content to look more like a real envelope

requirements.text: Remove the heart CTA from the envelope by ensuring there is no heart call-to-action element (heart emoji/icon, heart button, or CTA copy) inside the selected envelope content block at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3]. Apply changes ONLY to that selected element.

quotes: remove the heart CTA from the envlope

acceptanceCriteria: On Screen 1, the selected content block contains no heart CTA UI (no heart icon/emoji CTA, no heart button, and no CTA-like heart label)
No other elements outside the selected XPath are modified

requirements.text: Update the styling/structure of the selected envelope content block at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3] so the envelope looks more like a real envelope (e.g., content positioned like an address area rather than a centered headline, subtle address-line treatment). Apply changes ONLY to that selected element.

quotes: make it look more like a envelop

acceptanceCriteria: On Screen 1, the content within the selected block is visually styled/positioned to resemble an envelope address area (not a centered CTA-style layout)
The selected block remains readable and does not appear underneath the heart seal (no overlap/obscuring)
No other elements outside the selected XPath are modified

constraints: Apply the requested changes ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3].
All user-facing text must remain in English.
nonGoals: Do not change any other parts of the envelope (flap/base/heart seal), scene flow, or animations outside the selected element.
Do not introduce any backend changes.
